attributes.action: Stop Rishi Sunak scrapping Trans Rights from the UK Equality Act
attributes.additional_details: Trans teens are among the most likely to kill themselves. Are the Government going to simply stand by and let an already bad situation only get worse? The Government can't seriously let Rishi Sunak go through with this process.
attributes.background: Rishi Sunak shouldn't be allowed to scrap trans rights. LGBTQ lives matter and the T is not and never will be up for debate

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627984
